docs.snippet: Florida State's Jameis Winston began double-duty last week as the football team started spring practices. The Heisman winner missed a football practice Saturday, but that's the only session he's scheduled to miss this spring....
docs.lead_paragraph: Florida State's Jameis Winston began double-duty last week as the football team started spring practices. The Heisman winner missed a football practice Saturday, but that's the only session he's scheduled to miss this spring.

headline.main: Heisman Winner Winston Gets 4th Save of Season
headline.print_headline: Heisman Winner Winston Gets 4th Save of Season

docs.snippet: Arsenal midfielder Mikel Arteta has apologised to club and fans for Saturday's 6-0 drubbing at Chelsea and promised that the hurting players will do their best to make amends....
docs.lead_paragraph: Arsenal midfielder Mikel Arteta has apologised to club and fans for Saturday's 6-0 drubbing at Chelsea and promised that the hurting players will do their best to make amends.

docs.snippet: Germany have opted not to bring in goalline technology after the clubs from the top two divisions voted against it, the Football League (DFL) said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany have opted not to bring in goalline technology after the clubs from the top two divisions voted against it, the Football League (DFL) said on Monday.

docs.snippet: The ACC's national championship hopes now come down to one school: Virginia....

docs.snippet: The bodies of five people were found inside the wreckage of a single-engine plane that crashed into a cold, murky reservoir in southwestern Colorado over the weekend, authorities said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The bodies of five people were found inside the wreckage of a single-engine plane that crashed into a cold, murky reservoir in southwestern Colorado over the weekend, authorities said Monday.

headline.main: 5 Bodies Found in Colorado Plane Crash Wreckage
headline.print_headline: 5 Bodies Found in Colorado Plane Crash Wreckage

docs.snippet: Former professional football star Darren Sharper, who is accused of drugging and raping two women in California, must remain in jail in Los Angeles pending a possible extradition request from Arizona over sexual assault charges in that state, a ju...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former professional football star Darren Sharper, who is accused of drugging and raping two women in California, must remain in jail in Los Angeles pending a possible extradition request from Arizona over sexual assault charges in that state, a judge ruled on Monday.

headline.main: Judge Orders Former NFL Star Darren Sharper to Remain in Jail
headline.print_headline: Judge Orders Former NFL Star Darren Sharper to Remain in Jail
